document_data.name: Sarah Lurian
document_data.home: [[Nobles District]],{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|4}} [[Procampur]], [[the Vast]]
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Sarah Lurian''' was a noble of House [[Lurian]] in the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite document/Procampur City Expansion Packet|9}}{{Cite web/House Lurian}}
document_data.Relationships: She was a relative of Lord Consul [[Povalo Lurian]], the head of the family.While several members of House Lurian are known, most of their relationships are unknown; Sarah is most likely intended to be a daughter of Povalo and [[Jasmine Lurian]].
